name: World War Pilot
description:
Accomplish the most dangerous military missions.
Serve in the air forces and obtain a higher military rank for every successful operation.

When on mission, it is vital to know your enemy's position. This information is displayed on your radar.
Also, watch your altitude: make sure you don't ingloriously fall into a pound.
Mission only lasts several minutes: it's enough to destroy all enemies in clear view.
Aim and shoot missiles, but don't forget to pilot your plane properly, all at the same time.
Sounds like quite a challenge!

Game info:
- Immersive World War I shooter
- Incredible WWI planes;
- Realistic WWI plane piloting
- Military ranks and achievements;
- Campaign mode/free flight.
